DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the safety, tolerability, and pharmacokinetics of single doses of HKI-357 administered to healthy subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating the Safety, Tolerability, and Pharmacokinetics (PK) of HKI-357 Administered Orally to Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Eligibility Criteria: Healthy adult men or women of nonchildbearing potential, aged 1850.
